title: Reaper Soraka looks amazing!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/cDGjpAg.jpg


Thank you Riot! You're so great, this skin is really amazing and I am going to wear it every single game. So much wonderful effort went in to this and it really paid off!  You guys are great! As a Soraka lover I say 10/10 I approve! (same can't be said about forums tho)

I was about to make a thread saying she needs an evil/fallen skin! I am so giddy right now I can barely type! I LOVE ITTTTTT.


(pls don't delete this thread like you've deleted all of mine)
(NOT BEING SARCAST I JUST DON'T WANT MY THREAD DELETED, AGAIN)
